channel.title: How Do You Make Desert Bandits Attack If You Have Zamorak or Saradomin?
channel.description: Ok, I know this may be hard, but how would I make it that a bandit (npc 1926) attack if I have zamorak or saradomin items? Like, 1033, 1035, 2414, and way more items. I can add the item numbers/id's but how would I make it so that an npc attacks if you have a certain item on you? (Weilding)
